Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue just east of the intersection with Leviathan.
Room.LongDescription: This is a very high class neighborhood with several swank shops to the south. Further to the east is the famous Ashton Falls Resort. Many of the city's most wealthy and influential residents live there, and the small shopping center on the south side of the avenue caters to their needs. One of the best restaurants in the city, Antoine's Grill, is in there.
